name: To The Castle - A ghoulie retro platformer
name_original: To The Castle - A ghoulie retro platformer
description:
Do you like dark medieval adventures, with gloomy castles and foggy forests?
Do you like puzzles & platformers?
Do you like retro gaming style?

Then this is your game!!

To The Castle takes all the vibrant mood of those good and old platform arcades and refreshes it in a complete new environment in the palm of your hand with a very accurate and well adapted control:
* Help Sir Petrionius in his dangerous quest, dashing and jumping 'til you reach the exit of each level.
* Defy the undead zombies and other evil forces in this Pixel-Art epic adventure while you explore untamed dark lands and loot treasures!
* A total of 60 levels spread on 3 Mysterious worlds.
* Create challenging new dungeons and share them with your friends with the integrated level editor and get incredible rewards for them.
* Play levels from people around the world with our cross platform server.
* Collect coins and buy items and gems that will help you in your deadly quest.

Thrilling adventures that bring you the best of the action arcade gaming!

Stay tuned and follow us at:
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/dodozen
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/DodozenGames
DODOZEN SITE: http://dodozen.com/
